Class CardSide

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.CardSide
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardSide extends Object implements Serializable
Class containing information about a card's side.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSide

      CardSide(int points, EnumMap<ResourceType,Integer> cost, EnumMap<ResourceType,Integer> permanentResourcesGiven, CardSide.PointMultiplierPolicy pointMultiplierPolicy, SideType sideType, Cornerable[] corners)
      Creates a new card side.
      Parameters:
      points - The base points scored when the card is played.
      cost - The resources needed to play the card.
      permanentResourcesGiven - The permanent resources given by the card.
      pointMultiplierPolicy - The policy to use to multiply the base points.
      sideType - The side type (front or back) of the card.
      corners - The corners of this card. Must be in the order TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT.

  • Method Details

      public int getAwardedPoints(PlayArea playArea)
      Calculates the points given by this card upon placement in the given playArea.
      Parameters:
      playArea - The player's play area.
      Returns:
      The awarded points.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • commonSidesFactory

      static CardSide commonSidesFactory(String name)
      Returns a previously added CardSide, given the name. Used to allow reuse of identical CardSides in different cards.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the side to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the side with the given name, or null if there is no such side.

    • addCommonSide

      static void addCommonSide(String name, CardSide cardSide)
      Adds a CardSide with the given name to a common side registry. Used to allow reuse of identical CardSides in different cards.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the side to add to the registry.
      cardSide - The CardSide to add to the registry.
